thread.title: What's new on Netflix UK in October
thread.title_full: What's new on Netflix UK in October (From Herald Scotland)

author: heraldscotland.com
title: What's new on Netflix UK in October
text:
With Halloween just around the corner it's no suprise Netflix has added a load of thrilling and horrifying content to give you your horror fix over the next month.
With enough new content for you to spend October on the sofa binging, it's hard to know where to start - we've picked out some of our favourite additions for you below - and you can find the full list at the bottom of the article.
American Horror Story: Freak Show - 21st October Fans of American Horror Story will be please to learn that Freak Show has *finally* been added to Netflix UK.
Scream TV Series - 1st October
Picking up where your favourite slasher movie left off, MTV's scream follows the residents of Lakewood as they experience new horrors.
Homeland Season 4 - 12th October
With Channel 4 about to air season 5 , now's your chance to catch up!
